reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I reach for this top in my closet often as I love the print and the style. It is a soft knit and not the cheap shiny fabric that loses the print when stretched. I’ve washed and dried it many times and the colors have stayed nice. The width Is very good if you have a bit of a tummy that you want to hide but still fits nice around the back without being too baggy. It’s the perfect length to wear with yoga pants. Not too long but just right to cover your crotch area and most of your butt if you want to be dressed modestly in public.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars very nice fabric
reviews.reviewText: this fabric is really nice, it is not that cheap clingy stretch polyester, it is rayon and polyester with a bit of stretch, almost feels like a cotton knit, very soft against your skin. this style is very flattering and you can wear it with leggings or jeans. I had to size up because I have bigger upper arms. I plan to buy more colors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Off shade of green
reviews.reviewText: this is a nice blouse and it fits well. The only comment I have is that is not the exact color as shown. It's more of a forest green.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks like the picture
reviews.reviewText: Owning a high end brand with the same look that gets a lot of compliments was eager to try this shirt. I like the appearance so much bought a second. The only con is color selection. Navy blue, black, and Royal would be a great edition. I’d buy all three.The material feels soft. The stitching is similar to the original I own from another brand. Though I like this material for it’s thicker feel. The other shirt’s lasted six years. Since my first purchase is white I’d be happy to get a couple of seasons use.The purple that’s on the way expect longer as white is more difficult to maintain the new vibe with wearing and laundry. I’ll repurchase as needed if this shirt is still for sale.Another thing that’s great, it’s not form fitting. And, not too loose. Just right. Flattering on my slender physique. It also lands below the belt at pocket height. I’m 5’ 91/2” so if you’re shorter expect this shirt to sit low to the tush in a flattering way.⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️💯

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Arms and chest are tight
reviews.reviewText: I like the way this fabric feels, it's soft and has some stretch. However, I wear XL in nearly all tops and this one fits a bit snug. Which is unfortunate because the body is okay - I'm afraid if I get an XXL, it will look like a tent! In addition, on the photoshopped model, the arms look loose when rolled up. On me, the arms are super snug when rolled up. I would only be able to wear them down. If you are a large chested woman, I would definitely size up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very pretty top!
reviews.reviewText: It's a stretchy polyester. Looks really nice on! Hangs pretty. The sizing is right.I have another of these shirts, liked it so much I had to get one more! 😁

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: If your shoulders & breasts are larger, definitely size up. I'm normally a Large & ordered an XL & it fits well. I really adore this top & will order more in different colors/styles. Material is soft & flowers. Good quality & made well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very pretty. The fabric is soft. Runs a tiny bit small but my size still fit.
